## Course Information

**Instructor:** TBD

## Course Description

This course provides an introduction to the theory and practice of investments.

## Learning Objectives

By the end of this course, students will be able to:

1. Understand fundamental investment concepts
2. Analyze risk and return of investment portfolios
3. Apply quantitative methods to investment decisions
